## Bundle.IBundleCreateParams.hashNormalizer property

Optional hash normalizer for generating checksums. If not provided, a CRC32 normalizer will be used for browser compatibility.

**Signature:**

```typescript
hashNormalizer?: Hash.HashingNormalizer;
```
